title: Special Deal Schema
description: The Special Deal Archetype - Essential properties that define a special deal

price.description: Product price in cents as an integer (whole number)

seller.description: The person or organization selling the product

category.description: General category of the product, e.g. Recreation

subcategory.description: Specific category of the product, e.g. Skydiving

initial_price.description: Initial product price (before deal) in cents as an integer (whole number)

quantity.description: Specific amount of times special deal can be used in total

expiration_date.description: Date and time of expiration in ISO 8601 date standard e.g. YYYY-MM-DDThh:mm:ss.sTZD

properties.description: URL to seller or organization's website

primary_image_archetype.description: Image Archetype ID to use as the primary image of this special deal

_id.description: Unique identifier for this special deal

created.description: Date and time the special deal was created in ISO 8601 date standard e.g. YYYY-MM-DDThh:mm:ss.sTZD

updated.description: Date and time the special deal was updated in ISO 8601 date standard e.g. YYYY-MM-DDThh:mm:ss.sTZD
